inline.description:
Search input box should get focus when Plugin Marketplace modal is opened
————————————————————————————
1. Login as admin
2. Click main-menu (hamburger icon)
3. Click Plugin Marketplace
inline.expectedResult: 1. User should be able to start type immediately to search plugin, rather than having to click on the search box
